name: The Realms of Hell
description:
The Realms of Hell Mud is a fantasy multi-user dungeon (MUD). In this text-based game you control a character that ventures forth into the world of Derlith, fighting enemies and gaining power. You may customize your character by choosing a variety of races and classes. Roleplaying is encouraged.

We have help for new people, a help-file system, a user-run wiki, and a nice version of the website for public computers. There are also several tools that let you interact with your character through this website.
To connect to the mud, access mud.rohonline.net, port 3333 through any client. Vista users will need extra setup.
